author: Mho_23
text:
here's how to create consistent characters with sora 2:

sora just dropped character cameos and nobody's using it right

the trick is you need to generate your character INSIDE sora first

here's the exact process:
- generate a video of your character standing/talking on white background in sora
- hit the 3 dots -> create character
- trim to the exact length you want
- boom, now you have a reusable cameo

normally you can't upload real people as cameos, but if you generate them in sora first, the system lets you save them

this means you can now use the same AI character across 100+ videos without consistency issues
